alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Monona (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 10:47PM CDT until May 12 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Monona County in west central Iowa... North central Harrison County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1047 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northeast of Magnolia, or 20 miles east of Tekamah, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Moorhead. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
